Headline: Buses rerouted off of DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: Buses continue to be rerouted away from outer DuSable Lake Shore Drive because of conditions from severe weather. transitchicago.com/alerts

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses are being rerouted away from DuSable Lake Shore Drive's outer lanes because of roadway conditions from severe weather.

See the following detailed alerts for each route's temporary routing:

  • #6 Jackson Park Express 
  • #J14 Jeffery Jump 
  • #26 South Shore Express* 
  • #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express 
  • #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express

*Express routing only runs part-time

Headline: Temporary Reroute Away From DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: 6 buses are temporarily rerouted NB via Lake Park, 47th, King Dr, Cermak to Michigan. SB via reverse from Balbo/Michigan, due to severe weather.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses are rerouted due to roadway conditions from severe weather.

  • Northbound buses are rerouted via Lake Park, 47th, King Drive and Cermak then resume their normal route on Michigan.
  • Southbound buses are rerouted via the same streets, starting after Balbo/Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute Away From DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: J14 buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Isl, 57th, Hyde Pk, Lake Pk, 47th, King Dr, Cermak, Michigan and Balbo, due to severe weather.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses, in both directions, are rerouted via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 57th, Hyde Park, Lake Park, 47th, King Drive, Cermak, Michigan and Balbo.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute Away From DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: 146 buses temp rerouted NB via Michigan, LSDr, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sheridan, LSDr; SB LSDr, LSD West, Cannon, Flrtn, Stockton, LaSalle, LSDr & Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to roadway conditions from severe weather:

  • Northbound buses are rerouted via Michigan, Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sheridan and Lake Shore Drive.
  • Southbound buses are rerouted via Foster, Marine, Lake Shore Drive, Lake Shore Drive West, Cannon, Fullerton, Stockton, LaSalle, Lake Shore Drive and Michigan. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute Away From DuSable Lake Shore Drive
ShortDescription: 147 buses temp rerouted NB via Michigan, Inner, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sheridan, LSDr; SB Inner, LSD West, Cannon, Flrtn, Stockton, LaSalle, Inner, Mich.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to roadway conditions from severe weather.

  • Northbound buses are rerouted via Michigan, Lake Shore Drive, LaSalle, Stockton, Cannon, Sheridan, and Lake Shore Drive.
  • Southbound buses are rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Lake Shore Drive West, Cannon, Fullerton, Stockton, LaSalle, Lake Shore Drive and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems near Racine. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems near Racine.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Thorndale. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Thorndale.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Orange Line Service Delayed at Midway
ShortDescription: Orange Line trains are standing at Midway due to a track condition. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Orange Line trains are standing at Midway due to a track condition.

Shuttle buses are available between Midway and Clark/Lake to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
